events.message: The candidate has submitted their application for the software engineer position, demonstrating strong experience in backend development.
After reviewing the application details, the candidate was categorised under the engineering cluster due to relevant software development skills.
A recruiter has been assigned to the candidate to proceed with the screening and coordinate the interview process efficiently.
The candidate passed the initial screening call, showing good communication skills and solid software engineering knowledge.
The candidate responded promptly and positively, expressing enthusiasm about the next steps in the interview process.
The technical interview has been scheduled for the candidate, focusing on advanced backend engineering problems and system design.
The candidate completed the technical interview successfully, demonstrating proficiency in algorithms, coding, and system architecture.
An HR interview has been scheduled to further assess cultural fit and discuss compensation expectations with the candidate.
The HR interview was completed with positive feedback regarding the candidateâ€™s alignment with company values and team dynamics.
An offer package has been proposed to the candidate, outlining competitive salary, benefits, and growth opportunities within the engineering team.
The candidate provided positive feedback on the offer and indicated a strong interest in joining the company as a software engineer.
The candidate formally accepted the offer, confirming their commitment to start onboarding and join the engineering team soon.
The onboarding process has started with the candidate, including orientation sessions and access setup for software development tools.
The hiring process has been successfully completed and the candidate is now formally a part of the engineering team.
